name: iPhone 17 256GB
description: The iPhone 17 (256 GB) is Apple’s latest smartphone with a bright 6.3-inch OLED display, A19 chip, and dual 48 MP cameras. It offers fast performance, long battery life, and plenty of storage for apps, photos, and videos.

name: Samsung Galaxy S25 256GB
description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 (256 GB) features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, Exynos 2500 processor, and triple 108 MP cameras. It offers high-speed performance, large storage, and a long-lasting battery.

name: OnePlus 13 Pro 256GB
description: The OnePlus 13 Pro (256 GB) comes with a 6.8-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 9 Gen 4 processor, and quad-camera setup. It delivers smooth performance, fast charging, and ample storage for apps and media.

name: Google Pixel 10 256GB
description: The Google Pixel 10 (256 GB) features a 6.5-inch OLED display, Tensor G4 processor, and dual 50 MP cameras with advanced AI features. It offers clean Android experience, excellent camera quality, and good battery life.

name: Xiaomi Mi 14 Ultra 256GB
description: The Xiaomi Mi 14 Ultra (256 GB) sports a 6.9-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 9 Gen 4+ processor, and penta-camera setup. It provides high performance, large storage, and fast charging for daily usage.

name: Google Pixel 10 256GB
description: The Google Pixel 10 (256 GB) features a 6.5-inch OLED display, Tensor G4 processor, and dual 50 MP cameras with advanced AI features. It offers clean Android experience, excellent camera quality, and good battery life.
